title: Ful Stack Web Developer -  Build a Secure One-Time Message Sharing Web App
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced full-stack web developer to build a secure, lightweight web application that allows users to create messages that can be read only once via a unique link — similar to Upgrade to see actual info, but with some additional functionality.

Key Features:
???? Frontend (User-facing):
User enters a message and clicks “Create Link”

A unique link is generated (e.g., Upgrade to see actual info/abc123)

The message is viewable only once via that link

After it's viewed, the link becomes invalid (visually marked as used)

???? Address Detection & Replacement:
Before the message is shown, the system checks for the presence of cryptocurrency wallet addresses (e.g., USDT on TRC20)

If a known address type is detected, it's automatically replaced with a predefined destination address configured by the admin

The recipient sees the version with the updated address

???? Admin Panel (Password-Protected):
View and manage all submitted messages in plaintext

Search, filter, and delete/archive messages

Configure replacement rules:

Select cryptocurrency (e.g., USDT, BTC)

Set network-specific target addresses (e.g., TRC20, ERC20, BEP20)

Technical Notes:
While the app simulates a secure environment for the user, messages will be stored in plaintext on the server for analysis and admin inspection.

No need for real end-to-end encryption – only visual representation of security is needed.
Ideal Candidate:
Proficient in modern web frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar)

Strong frontend skills (React, Vue, or similar)

Experience building secure, data-sensitive apps

Comfortable designing and implementing admin dashboards

Ability to implement simple, clean UI and clear link workflows

Deliverables:
Fully functional web app (frontend + backend)

Simple, modern UI

Admin interface with auth/login

Deployment-ready code (or Docker setup)

Brief technical handoff/documentation

To apply, please include:
A brief summary of your experience with similar apps

Tech stack you would use for this project

Timeline and estimated cost

Links to previous relevant work (if available)
